name: Continuum (itch) (Silver-C Games)
description:
IMPORTANT: If you downloaded the game before you saw this, delete the old file and redownload it. Extract all from the zip file and run the .exe file. Should work now.

A small, simple text adventure...?

-- Progress not saved between play sessions --

Made in Unity in about 2 weeks to be my first finished project. Writing could be better, but I think it does the job. Let me know what you think! :D

Also, this was absolutely a go with the flow game. I didn't have a hard plan while making it, and it kinda just ended up being this.

Glitch effect: https://github.com/keijiro/KinoGlitc
